subject: Productivity
title: Boredom as a Trigger
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Boredom as a Trigger.

hook.text: Data entry. Filing receipts. Some tasks are so dull that avoidance feels physically necessary.

buildup.text: Boredom is an emotional signal that the current task lacks meaning or stimulation.

discovery.text: Eastwood's research shows boredom increases when attention is unfocused and the task feels imposed.

twist.text: Adding small challenges or time pressure to boring tasks can make them surprisingly engaging.

climax.text: Gamification works because it reframes dull tasks as challenges worth completing.

punchline.text: Bored brains wander. Give them a challenge.

quiz.question: What can make boring tasks more engaging according to research?
options: Adding small challenges or time pressure
